revision.comment: /* Items needed to be found in raid for quests */
revision.text:
{{Infobox |title =Found in raid mark |main image2 =Found_in_raid_(Insulating_Tape).png |main image desc =Insulating Tape found in raid |image3 =insp_fir.png |image3 desc =Inspection view |group4 =When needed for a quest |image5 =fir_quest.png |image5 desc =WD-40 100ml. found in raid and needed for a quest |image6 =insp_fir_quest.png |image6 desc =Inspection view }}
A lot of [[Quests]] require items to be '''found in raid'''. Items found in raid can also be sold on the [[Trading#Flea Market|Flea Market]].
An item is marked as "Item found in raid" if:
*it was found in a raid and was not brought into that raid by a PMC and the extraction status is Survived. *it was crafted in the [[Hideout]]. *it was obtained as a quest reward.
